akka.actor
Interface IO.Input

All Known Implementing Classes:
IO.Chunk, IO.EOF$, IO.Error
Enclosing class:
IO
public static interface IO.Input

Represents part of a stream of bytes that can be processed by an IO.Iteratee.

Method Summary
 IO.Input $plus$plus(IO.Input that)
          Append another Input to this one.
 

Method Detail

$plus$plus

IO.Input $plus$plus(IO.Input that)
Append another Input to this one.

If 'that' is an akka.actor.IO.EOF then it will replace any remaining bytes in this Input. If 'this' is an akka.actor.IO.EOF then it will be replaced by 'that'.
